page.title: 16Scouts and Guides
page.content: The Boy Scout and Girl Guide movements are very popular and attract a large number of children.In Maryburgh there is a Brownie pack,Girl Guide company and a Cub Scout pack,while in Conon Bridge there are Brownies,Girl Guides, Cub Scouts and Scouts.The Scout Troop in Conon Bridge is made up of boys from both villages.Within our area ,at a site called Tollie of Brahan there is an official Scout camping site.As well as being used by local troops this site is widly used by Scouts from all over the British Isles and each summer Scouts from Europe also use this facility.On this site there are all the usuall camping facilities and it has the added advantage of being close to the mountains where rock climbing,hill walking and absailing can be carried out.It is also very near to Loch Ussie on which canoeing,
